page.title: 18HEALTH
page.content: THERE IS A LARGE {HEALTH CENTRE}IN REDDITCH OVER 20 DOCTORS SHARE THIS CENTRE.IN ADDITION THERE ARE SOME SPECIALIST FACILITIES AND A SMALL LOCAL HOSPITAL.A LARGE {NEW HOSPITAL} IS BEING BUILT AT WOODROW,THIS WILL CATER FOR THE INCREASED POPULATION,AND WILL ALSO SERVE AS A REGIONAL HOSPITAL FOR THIS PART OF THE MIDLANDS.FROM A CHILD'S BIRTH, THROUGH THE SCHOOL YEARS, THERE IS CAREFUL MONITORING OF HIS OR HER HEALTH.IN SCHOOL WE ARE SEEN BY THE DOCTOR,AND WE ARE EXAMINED.OUR WEIGHT IS CHECKED,OUR VISION AND OUR HEARING.THE NURSE COMES EVERY FEW WEEKS,SHE CHECKS OUR HAIR,LOOKING FOR HEADLICE,SHE CHECKS TO SEE THAT WE ARE CLEAN.IF YOU ARE ILL YOU CAN GO TO THE DOCTOR'S AND HE WILL GIVE YOU A PRESCRIPTION TO TAKE TO THE CHEMISTS.
